name: Anciently!
description:
Wanna go back to prehistoric time and meet some ancient animals?? Then you have to try this game!!!!

Anciently! is a game that will bring you to the most fascinating adventure. As "Dr. Kin", players have to fight against "Anhunters", main villain on this game who kidnapped the prehistoric animals.

This game consists of 5 levels with different prehistoric animals, different environment and different backsound on each level. 

Why should you be excited for this game?? Because every time you won the game on each level, you will get a knowledge (information summary) about the prehistoric animal that you have successfully rescued. 

So, what are you waiting for?! Tap that download button, install the game, and lets rescue the prehistoric animal!
